titleStmt.title: The gospelles of dystaues
Evangiles des quenouilles. English.
titleStmt.author: Watson, Henry, fl. 1500-1518.
Fouquart, de Cambray, maistre, attributed name.
Duval, Antoine, attributed name.
Jean, d'Arras, 14th cent, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Enprynted at London in Flete strete at the sygne of the sonne by Wynkyn de Worde,

notesStmt.note: A translation of "Les evangiles des quenouilles", which is sometimes attributed jointly to Fouquart de Cambray, Antoine Duval, and Jean d'Arras.
Translated by Henry Watson, whose initials appear on A2r.
Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date estimated by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: London in Flete strete at the sygne of the sonne
